Sharing session with CIAM UTM and first step towards a collaboration
====================================================================

by [attpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/attpic/ "Posts by attpic")
 | Aug 8, 2016 | [ATT](https://fke.utm.my/category/att/)

Alhamdulillah, we had the chance to share our works with CIAM UTM and initiated a collaboration for a project on Drones.

The continuation of this collaboration will be a meeting with the representative from Core Expert System onÂ 15th August 2016.
